author: KBSimplePlays
comment: Yes you are right! If things around you are full of many discouragements, unfair situations, bad things, and adverse fates, the meaning is absolutely the opposite.   Because behind your pain and struggles, there is something that will surprise you, no it's something that can even shock you or even make you happier. For example, the angel that came to you.  Is there something hurting you? Is there something destroying you? Is there something making you sad? Well endure it with patience, Life is teaching you a lesson and it's even preparing something better for you in the right time of your future.  Even the moon and the sun have their own time to shine. So we humans, have also our own right time to shine or achieve or even succeed.

No matter how you try, you will always fail but at least, please don't give up!!! ✌️😁👍  Fail to prepare or be prepared to fail?!! 🤔   😂Now I think it's impossible to cry without getting wet.😭   😃Once you dropped your happiness, it will be a sadness if you get it again. 😔      No matter how you try, you will always fail, don't worry, it's not like you're dead.  A low possibility is not zero, so always try no matter how very low your chances are👌✌️👉👍👍😎

author: applehead from neverland
comment: No. One day, you will pass... You are not a failure. Whatever people tell you, you are NOT.  Trust me, I've been there too. I used to be so lonely and cried myself to sleep, night after night, because I had  no friend. None Years, 5 years I used to live like this. I thought I was different, a loser with whom no one wanted to be friends.  But this angel came out of nowhere into my life. She is now my best friend. We've been together for 5 years now. I might have no other person to call a true friend, but that one person is enough. I know how you feel. Being a failure. I don't know why you feel this way, but please, love yourself. That is the first step to achieving anything in life.  Keep working hard, believe in yourself and don't let others bring you down. I'm just a teen so I know that feeling. But remember this ,  Seven Times Down, Eight Times Up...❤
